artist: Artist: Claes Janz. Visscher II; Artist: after Maarten de Vos
creditline: Gift of James A. Bergquist, Boston, in honor of Rachel McGarry
description: Jesus holding a cross at left with bird above his head, pointing up, seated next to a woman wearing a crown and holding a book; grape vines in foreground; text at bottom
inscription:
In plate, at bootom: Cantica.4.1.
In plate, lower right: 4
text: The Risen Christ sits in a vineyard with an elaborately dressed woman who wears a crown and appears to symbolize the Catholic Church or simply Faith. We know he is the risen Christ because of the nail wounds in his hands and foot. He points up the the docve of the Holy Spirit. The woman looks up, away from the open book on her lap, to see the dove.
title: Plate 4, from "The Song of Solomon"
